entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
